title: Tom Manion: "Brothers Forever"
description: Michael speaks with Tom Manion, co-author of "Brothers Forever: The Enduring Bond between a Marine and a Navy SEAL that Transcended Their Ultimate Sacrifice." Original air date 20 May 2014. The book was published on 13 May 2014.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Tom Manion, Michael Smerconish)
